name: City Connection 3D
description:
City Connection 3D is an arcade game, inspired by City Connection, in which you have to color all the roads on the map while dodging obstacles.

How to play:

Dodge obstacles with the various types of jumps available and collect ammo. the car is always in motion and cannot be stopped.

Available modes:

Normal, Hard, Inferno.

Controls:

S: Change direction

DOWN ARROW: Jump

UP ARROW = High jump

W: double jump when in the air after a jump

SPACE BAR:  Shoot 

Android: 

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=org.godotengine.cityconnectionnoad...

Free version: 

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=org.godotengine.newcityconnection
